    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        public void spawn(float chance,
                  boolean generatingworld)
        Description copied from class: FeatureGenerator
        Spawns Actors into the game world. Used both during world generation and during a game's progress.
        Overrides:
        spawn in class FeatureGenerator
        Parameters:
        chance - Used to modify the default spawning chances. For example: if this is called daily but the target is to spawn one feature per week then one would provide a 1/7f value here. The default spawning chances are calculated so as to sum up to 100% so using a value of 1 would be likely to spawn 1 random feature in the world map, but could spawn more or none depending on the random number generator results.
        generatingworld - If false will limit spawning to only a starting set of actors. true is supposed to be used while the game is progressing to support the full feature set.
        See Also:
        GenerationData.starting

      • generate

        public Town generate(java.util.LinkedList<Realm> realms,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<Point>> regions,
                     World w)
        Description copied from class: FeatureGenerator
        Starts generating the inital state for this World. TODO parameters should be a Map instead of 2 lists
        Overrides:
        generate in class FeatureGenerator
        Parameters:
        realms - Shuffled list of realms.
        regions - Each area in the world, in the same order as the realms.
        See Also:
        Terrain
